import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useCookies } from 'react-cookie' import NavbarProfile from '../components/navbarProfile.component' const PersonalData = () => { const [cookie, setCookie] = useCookies(['user']), [user, setUser] = useState({ since_create: '', fullname: '', name: '', surname: '', username: '', public_token: '', location: '', address: { street_name: '', street_number: 0, zip_code: '' }, DNI: 0, email: '', business: '', social_medial: '', phone: { number: 0, area_code: 0 } }) const handlerGetUser = async () => { const userData = await (await axios.get(`${process.env.API_PATH}/v1/user/${cookie.user.id}`)).data setUser({ since_create: userData.since_create, fullname: userData.fullname, name: userData.name, surname: userData.surname, username: userData.username, public_token: userData.public_token, location: userData.location, address: { street_name: userData.address.street_name, street_number: userData.address.street_number, zip_code: userData.address.zip_code }, DNI: userData.DNI, email: userData.email, business: userData.business, social_medial: userData.social_medial, phone: { number: userData.phone.number, area_code: userData.phone.area_code } }) } const handlerSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault() const response = await (await axios.put(`${process.env.API_PATH}/v1/user/${cookie.user.id}`, user)).data console.log(response) }, handlerFullname = e => { const userData = user userData.fullname = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerName = e => { const userData = user userData.name = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerSurname = e => { const userData = user userData.surname = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerUsername = e => { const userData = user userData.username = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerPublicToken = e => { const userData = user userData.public_token = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerLocation = e => { const userData = user userData.location = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerStreetName = e => { const userData = user userData.address.street_name = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerStreetNumber = e => { const userData = user userData.address.street_number = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerZipCode = e => { const userData = user userData.address.zip_code = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerDNI = e => { const userData = user userData.DNI = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerEmail = e => { const userData = user userData.email = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerBusiness = e => { const userData = user userData.business = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerSocialMedial = e => { const userData = user userData.social_medial = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerNumber = e => { const userData = user userData.phone.number = e.target.value setUser(userData) }, handlerAreaCode = e => { const userData = user userData.phone.area_code = e.target.value setUser(userData) } useEffect(() => { handlerGetUser() }, []) return( <>
{ user && ( <>

Altura

) }
) } export default PersonalData
